bike.description: Specialized FACT 7r N'Aero tube shaping, compact aero geometry, vertical seat adjustment

components.description: Specialized FACT N'Aero fork, alloy 1" steerer
Specialized Mindset Plus Carbon, 1" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4-position adjustable
Zipp Vuka Clip carbon aero bar with Zertz Bullhorn base bar
Shimano Ultegra, braze-on clamp, bottom pull
Mavic Ksyrium Equipe, 18 hole, Mavic QR
Mavic Ksyrium Equipe, 20 hole, Mavic QR
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x21c, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x21c, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Body Geometry TriTip, super light foam, carbon reinforced base, hollow Ti rails, microfiber cover, 50mm nose width
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
